analyzed: spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thugs mnga' ba /

original: chos kyi ye shes la nem nur mi mnga' ba /
analyzed: chos kyi ye shes la nem nur mi mnga' ba /

original: rnam par ma brtags pa'i skad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par gnon pa'i ye shes can /
analyzed: rnam par ma brtags pa'i skad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par gnon pa'i ye shes can /

original: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa mi gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa mi gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa /

original: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rnam par spyod cing yul ma ga dha'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po byang chub la pho brang 'od kun nas 'byung ba na /

analyzed: gdan sengge'i khri padmo'i snying po can la bzhugs shing /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang /

translated: There were also bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas as numerous as the atoms in a billion ineffable quintillion buddha realms,

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu tshe gcig gis thogs pa /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa kun kyang /

translated: and all had attained the bodhisattvas‚Äô entire way of wisdom.

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa thams cad dpyad pa'i tshul gyi ye shes 'byams klas pa la zhugs pa dag ste /
translated: They had entered the boundless wisdom that examines all the infinite world systems.

original: 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa dang / spyod yul dang ye shes la spyod cing rtog pa spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa spyod pa nye bar bzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa dang / spyod yul dang ye shes la spyod cing rtog pa spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa spyod pa nye bar bzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pas /
translated: In this way, they are skilled in the means to guide all beings to the level of nirvƒÅ·πáa, the domain of wisdom, and the practice of cutting through all conceptual elaborations and thoughts.

original: sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They are skilled in the means to guide all beings.

original: chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu zhugs pa /üîΩsems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za zhing mi dmigs par brtag cing dpyad pa la shin tu mkhas pa /

translated: They are engaged in the way of the Dharma, which is without end or middle.üîΩThey are skilled in the means to examine and analyze the ripening of the karma of all beings, which is neither wasted nor reified.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba mthon dman brtag cing dpyad pa la rab tu mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba mthon dman brtag cing dpyad pa la rab tu mkhas pa /
translated: They are skilled in the means to examine and analyze the higher and lower aspirations, habitual tendencies, faculties, undertakings, and practices of all beings.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung zhing bcang ba dang / shes par bya ba dang / mnyam par gzung ba dang / brtag par bya ba la shin tu mkhas pa 'jig rten dang /

translated: They were skilled in upholding, preserving, understanding, retaining, and investigating the meaning, words, and letters that were taught by all the tathƒÅgatas of the past, present, and future.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gi de ma thag tu rab tu thob par rnam par spyod pa /

analyzed: spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa dang / tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa dang / sems rab tu dang ba'i phyir /
translated: It is in harmony with the conduct of all bodhisattvas because it is the same for all of them.

original: sangs rgyas mchod pa rgyu mthun pa dang / pha lta bur brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchod pa rgyu mthun pa dang / pha lta bur brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: It is in harmony with the worship of the buddhas because it is a pure state of mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyu mthun pa'o //
translated: It is in harmony with all the tathagatas because it is like a father.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the victors!

original: bcu po de dag ni /üîΩbyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa ste /
translated: These are the ten harmonies.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: The bodhisattvas, dwelling in them, will attain the great, unsurpassable wisdom of the tathagatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: O son of the victors!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te /
translated: These are the ten perceptions of wonder.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi dge bar 'du shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sa bon du 'du shes pa dang / sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi snod du 'du shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad la smon lam med par 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi dge bar 'du shes pa dang / dge ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sa bon du 'du shes pa dang / sems can thams cad la byang chub kyi snod du 'du shes pa dang / smon lam thams cad la smon lam med par 'du shes pa dang /
translated: It is to perceive all aspirations as being without aspirations.üîΩIt is to perceive all phenomena as arising.üîΩIt is to perceive all conduct as being without conduct.üîΩIt is to perceive all phenomena as the qualities of buddhahood.

original: chos thams cad la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la spyod pa med par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'du shes pa dang / tshig tu spyod pa thams cad la ngag gi lam med par 'du shes pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la spyod pa med par 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'du shes pa dang / tshig tu spyod pa thams cad la ngag gi lam med par 'du shes pa dang /
translated: It is to perceive all verbal conduct as being beyond the path of speech.üîΩIt is to perceive all buddhas as fathers.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la phar 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gnyis su med par 'du shes pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la phar 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gnyis su med par 'du shes pa'o //
translated: It is to perceive all thus-gone ones as nondual.

original: kye @206a *// rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye @206a *// rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te /
translated: the bodhisattvas‚Äô perception of the marvelous.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'du shes rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'du shes rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas pa /
translated: Abiding in those, bodhisattvas become skilled in the reversal of perceptions.

original: bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: They attain the unsurpassed.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste /
translated: bodhisattvas‚Äô activities.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i don du spyod pa dang / bslab pa thams cad nan tan du bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i don du spyod pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i don du spyod pa dang / bslab pa thams cad nan tan du bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i don du spyod pa dang /
translated: They are the activity for the sake of ripening all sentient beings, the activity for the sake of seeking all Dharmas, the activity for the sake of earnestly applying oneself to all trainings, the activity for the sake of accumulating all roots of virtue,

original: ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / ye shes rab tu shes par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / sgom pa yongs su bsgom pa'i don du spyod pa dang / zhing brgyan pa'i don du spyod pa dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / ye shes rab tu shes par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang / sgom pa yongs su bsgom pa'i don du spyod pa dang / zhing brgyan pa'i don du spyod pa dang /
translated: the practice of one-pointed concentration, the practice of understanding wisdom, the practice of cultivating meditation, the practice of adorning the buddhafields,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i don du spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i don du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i don du spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i don du spyod pa'o //
translated: the practice of serving spiritual benefactors, and the practice of making offerings to and serving the tathƒÅgatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste /
translated: These ten are the practices of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing /
translated: Abiding in them,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i spyod pa bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i spyod pa bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: the bodhisattvas will attain the unsurpassable, perfect great wisdom of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i @206b bshes gnyen te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i @206b bshes gnyen te /
translated: These ten are the spiritual benefactors of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / chos thams cad ston pa'i bshes gnyen dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / chos thams cad ston pa'i bshes gnyen dang /
translated: They are the spiritual masters who introduce them to the mind of awakening, the spiritual masters who connect them to the roots of virtue, the spiritual masters who introduce them to the perfections, the spiritual masters who teach them all the Dharma,

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / spobs pa la rnam par gdon mi za bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 'gro ba thams cad nas gyen du bskyod pa'i bshes gnyen dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing mi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang /üîΩkun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / spobs pa la rnam par gdon mi za bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / 'gro ba thams cad nas gyen du bskyod pa'i bshes gnyen dang / bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing mi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing /
translated: the spiritual masters who introduce them to the ripening of all beings, the spiritual masters who ensure their eloquence, the spiritual masters who cause them to rise above all worlds, the spiritual masters who cause them to remain without weariness for all eons,

original: 'bab par byed pa'i bshes gnyen te /
analyzed: 'bab par byed pa'i bshes gnyen te /
translated: the spiritual masters who introduce them to the conduct of Samantabhadra, and the spiritual masters who cause them to enter the wisdom of all buddhas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of noble family!

analyzed: bcu po de dag ni; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen no //
translated: These are the ten kinds of spiritual benefactors.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victorious ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste /
translated: These are the ten kinds of bodhisattvas‚Äô activities:

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / chos thams cad la gzung bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / chos thams cad la gzung bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
translated: They are the activities of bodhisattvas who are intent on ripening all sentient beings; who are intent on upholding all the teachings; who are intent on purifying all world systems;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad shes par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / @207a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad shes par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / @207a *//
translated: who are intent on knowing all the bodhisattva trainings;

original: sems can thams cad kyi nyes byas zad par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcad do snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi nyes byas zad par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcad do snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
translated: They are: to strive with diligence thinking, ‚ÄúI will bring to exhaustion all the faults of all sentient beings‚Äù; to strive with diligence thinking, ‚ÄúI will cut the continuum of all the sufferings of the hells, the animal realms, and the world of Yama‚Äù;

original: bdud thams cad las rgyal bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khrug pa med par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mnyes par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: bdud thams cad las rgyal bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sems can thams cad 'khrug pa med par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mnyes par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o //
translated: to strive with diligence thinking, ‚ÄúI will conquer all mƒÅras‚Äù; to strive with diligence thinking, ‚ÄúI will bring all sentient beings to a state of non-conflict‚Äù; to strive with diligence thinking, ‚ÄúI will make offerings to all the buddhas‚Äù; and to strive with diligence thinking, ‚ÄúI will please all the tathƒÅgatas.‚Äù

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste /

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /

translated: ‚ÄúO son of the conquerors!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa thob pa ste /

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: If you ask what are the ten,üîΩthey are as follows:

original: 'di ltar bdag ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin gyi /

analyzed: da dung gzhan yang rtsod pa med par @207b dga' ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //

analyzed: bdag ni byis pa'i chos las 'phags kyi /

translated: I will set others out on the path of the perfections.üîΩI have been born into the family of the Buddhas.üîΩI will set others to be born into the family of the Buddhas.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //
translated: I have entered the way of the Dharma of non-apprehension.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-apprehension.

original: bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba btsal ba la brtson pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba btsal ba la brtson pa yin gyi /
translated: I have entered the way of the Dharma of non-production.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-production.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-existence.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-existence.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-distinction.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-distinction.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-manipulation.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-manipulation.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-defilement and non-purification.

analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba yin gyi /
translated: I have entered the way of the Dharma of non-production and non-stopping.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-production and non-stopping.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-defilement and non-purification.

analyzed: da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //

translated: I have entered the way of the Dharma of non-performance and non-occurrence.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-performance and non-occurrence.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-production and non-stopping.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-production and non-stopping.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-apprehension.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-apprehension.üîΩI have entered the way of the Dharma of non-existence.üîΩI will set others in the way of the Dharma of non-existence

original: da dung gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: da dung gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //
translated: I will also establish others in the way of the Dharma of non-existence.

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba la brtson pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba la brtson pa yin gyi /
translated: I am striving not to abandon any of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong bar brtson pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong bar brtson pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //

analyzed: bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyi /

original: da dung gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs @208a *//üîΩphyin pa 'thob bo //

analyzed: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par zhugs pa yin gyi /
translated: I have entered the inexhaustible treasure of the wisdom of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: da dung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //
analyzed: da dung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo //
translated: Furthermore, they obtain the assurance of the attainment of the inexhaustible entry into the treasury of the wisdom of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Jinaputra!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa 'thob pa ste /
translated: assurances of the bodhisattvas.üîΩAbiding in these, the bodhisattvas attain the unsurpassed assurance of the great wisdom of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Jinaputra!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag ste /
translated: maturations of sentient beings by the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni; sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni; sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattvas bring the realm of sentient beings to maturity through generosity,

original: gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: and also bring the realm of sentient beings to maturity through form,

original: chos ston pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: chos ston pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By teaching the Dharma, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: bskal pa mnyam pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: bskal pa mnyam pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By being the same in the three times, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: gnas med pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: gnas med pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By being without a home, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By describing the conduct of the bodhisattvas, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar ba yang dag par @208b bsten pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar ba yang dag par @208b bsten pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By burning up the world with the fire of his wisdom, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By describing the greatness of the Buddha‚Äôs Dharma, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul bas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: By manifesting various miracles, he brings the world of sentient beings to maturity.

original: thabs mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang / tshul gyis 'jig rten du spyod pa sna tshogs kyis kyang /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang / tshul gyis 'jig rten du spyod pa sna tshogs kyis kyang /
translated: And through various worldly activities and skillful means,üîΩ

original: sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: They also bring beings to full maturity through various worldly activities, such as skillful means and conduct.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: O son of noble family!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ste /
translated: These are the ten ways in which bodhisattvas bring beings to full maturity.

original: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pa dag go /
analyzed: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pa dag go /
translated: Through these, bodhisattvas bring the realms of beings to full maturity.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: O son of noble family!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te /
translated: These are the ten kinds of bodhisattva ethics.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la phan par dga' bas rnam par lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul khrims dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims dang / sems can thams cad la phan par dga' bas rnam par lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul khrims dang /
translated: They are the morality of not letting the Thought of Enlightenment deteriorate; the morality of avoiding the stages of the Disciples and the Self-Buddhas; the morality of observing with joy the benefit of all sentient beings; the morality of establishing all sentient beings in the Buddha's Doctrine;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas @209a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas @209a *//
translated: the morality of assiduously practicing all the Bodhisattva trainings; the morality of not objectifying any dharmas; the morality of dedicating all roots of virtue to enlightenment; and the morality of not abandoning the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: kyi chos thams cad las phyir phyogs su mi lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / dbang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims so //
analyzed: kyi chos thams cad las phyir phyogs su mi lta ba'i tshul khrims dang / chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / dbang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims so //
translated: the morality of not turning away from any phenomenon, the morality of not clinging to the realization of any phenomenon, and the morality of controlling the senses.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te /
translated: These ten are the moralities of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: Abiding in them, the bodhisattvas attain the unexcelled transcendence of morality, the vast morality of the tathagatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste /
translated: These ten are the predictions of the bodhisattvas.

original: lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: The bodhisattvas who are predicted by those predictions know, ‚ÄòWe have been predicted.‚Äô

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar snying thag pa nas byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar snying thag pa nas byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa ni /
translated: In this way, the perfect thought of enlightenment is generated from the depths of the heart.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi rgyud las lung bstan pa'o //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi skyo ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi rgyud las lung bstan pa'o // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi skyo ba ni /
translated: Thus, the perfect thought of enlightenment from the very depths of the heart is the prediction of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o //üîΩbskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o // bskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa ni /
translated: The non-discouragement of the bodhisattvas with regard to the bodhisattva-practices is the prediction of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nan tan du byed pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o // sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nan tan du byed pa ni /
translated: The non-weariness with all the aeons is the prediction of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //
translated: The practice of all the buddha-qualities is the prediction of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par mos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pa @209b ni; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par gsog cing sgrub pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par mos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pa @209b ni; byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par gsog cing sgrub pa ni /
translated: The single-minded faith and trust in the word of all the Tathagatas is the prediction of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //
translated: The accumulation and accomplishment of all the roots of virtue is the prediction of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par brtson pa ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par brtson pa ni /
translated: They strive to establish all sentient beings in the enlightenment of buddhahood.üîΩ

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //üîΩdge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe prophecy of the bodhisattvas is to be dedicated to establishing all beings in the enlightenment of buddhahood.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //üîΩdge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o // dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe prophecy of the bodhisattvas is to be of one nature with all spiritual friends.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //üîΩsngon gyi byang chub kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o // sngon gyi byang chub kyi smon lam rjes su srung ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThe prophecy of the bodhisattvas is to perceive all spiritual friends as teachers.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe prophecy of the bodhisattvas is to be a protector of the past prayers for enlightenment.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO Jinaputra!üîΩThese are the ten prophecies

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste /
translated: of the bodhisattvas.

original: lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: lung bstan pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: The bodhisattvas who are prophesied by those prophecies know, ‚ÄòWe have been prophesied.‚Äô

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Jinaputra!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste /
translated: engagements of the bodhisattvas in the bodhisattva canon.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar sngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang / bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang /üîΩmos pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhing gi rgyan la 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par @210a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa dang / bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / mos pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang / zhing gi rgyan la 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par @210a *//
translated: They are the engagement in former aspirations, the engagement in conduct, the engagement in perfect accomplishment, the engagement in the perfections, the engagement in practice, the engagement in the different kinds of aspirations,

original: 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / skye ba bstan pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / skye ba bstan pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: the engagement in the different kinds of interests, the engagement in the adornment of the buddhafields, the engagement in the miraculous manifestations of the bodhisattvas, and the engagement in the display of birth.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O son of the conquerors!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste /

original: 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag go /
analyzed: 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag go /
translated: These are the approaches of all bodhisattvas of the past, present, and future.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste /
translated: are the bodhisattvas‚Äô approaches to the thus-gone ones.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar mu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar mu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang /
translated: They are the approach of infinite perfect awakening, the approach of the infinite turning of the wheel of Dharma, the approach of the infinite Dharma way, the approach of the infinite sound-circle,

original: mu med pa'i sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: mu med pa'i sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /
translated: the approach of the infinite training of sentient beings, the approach of the infinite miraculous manifestations, the approach of the infinite variety of bodies, the approach of the infinite absorptions,

original: mu med pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mu med pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la 'jug pa dang / mu med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'o //
translated: and the teaching of boundless nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors,

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: these ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste /
translated: are the bodhisattvas‚Äô entries into the tathƒÅgatas.

original: 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la @210b 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: 'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la @210b 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: Through these entries, they enter into all the tathƒÅgatas of the past, present, and future.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors,

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: these ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa ste /
translated: are the bodhisattvas‚Äô entries into the thoughts and conduct of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi spyod pa dang bsam pa la 'jug pa de dag gis ni /
analyzed: sems can gyi spyod pa dang bsam pa la 'jug pa de dag gis ni /
translated: Through these entries into the thoughts and conduct of sentient beings,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / spyod pa la rab tu 'jug go /
translated: the bodhisattvas enter into the thoughts and conduct of all sentient beings.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
translated: It is to engage in the conduct of all sentient beings in the past. It is to engage in the conduct of all sentient beings in the future. It is to engage in the conduct of all sentient beings in the present. It is to engage in the virtuous conduct of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /
translated: It is to engage in the nonvirtuous conduct of all sentient beings. It is to engage in the conduct of the minds of all sentient beings. It is to engage in the conduct of the faculties of all sentient beings. It is to engage in the conduct of the various aspirations of all sentient beings.

translated: It is to engage with the afflictions of the world. It is to engage with the purification of the world. It is to engage with the world as small. It is to engage with the world as great.

translated: It is to engage with the world as being contained within the most subtle particles. It is to engage with the world as subtle. It is to engage with the world as vast. It is to engage with the world as an origin.

translated: the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of the ma·πá·∏çala of melody, in order to engage in inconceivable languages, sounds, and conventions; the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of the three times, in order to teach the inconceivable Dharma of the buddhas of the past, present, and future;üîΩthe dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of various eloquence, in order to teach all the different aspects of the limitless and boundless Dharma of the buddhas; the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of the accomplishment of unobstructed ears, in order to fill the entire range of hearing with the occurrence of all the inexpressible buddhas;

translated: the buddha of mind, the buddha of meditative absorption, the buddha of nature, and the buddha of the mind‚Äôs disposition.

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These ten

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste /
translated: are the bodhisattvas' generation of the excellent mind of enlightenment.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: In this way, that generation of the mind is endowed with great love because it completely protects all beings.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: That generation of the mind is endowed with great compassion because it takes upon itself the mass of suffering of all beings.

original: sems bskyed pa de @214b ni ci bdog pa yongs su gtong ba'i phyir gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de @214b ni ci bdog pa yongs su gtong ba'i phyir gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: That generation of the mind is preceded by the complete relinquishment of all possessions.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'o //
translated: This generation of the Thought is preceded by the attention to the knowledge of a Omniscient One, by the aspiration to all the qualities of a Buddha.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du byed pas yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du byed pas yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: This generation of the Thought is adorned with virtues, by the practice of all the Bodhisattva trainings.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du nyams par mi 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du nyams par mi 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu'o //
translated: This generation of the Thought is like a diamond, by its not being broken in all the places of birth.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni chos dkar po thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni chos dkar po thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu'o //
translated: This generation of the Thought is like an ocean, by its being the right resort for all the bright things.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni gzhan gyi ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smos pa'i ngag dang / tshig bzod pa'i phyir ri bo chen po'i dbang po dam pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni gzhan gyi ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smos pa'i ngag dang / tshig bzod pa'i phyir ri bo chen po'i dbang po dam pa lta bu'o //
translated: This generation of the Thought is like the best of the great mountain kings, by its being patient with the bad speech, bad talk, and bad words of others.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la dbugs phyin pa chen pos sdud pa'i phyir bde bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la dbugs phyin pa chen pos sdud pa'i phyir bde bar byed pa'o //
translated: This generation of the Thought is a bringer of happiness, by its being the great relief and comfort of all sentient beings.

original: sems bskyed pa de ni chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rtogs par khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de ni chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rtogs par khong du chud pa'o //
translated: This arousing of the mind is realized by the perfection of wisdom, because it is not perceived by skill in the analysis of all phenomena.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious One!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These ten

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste /
translated: are the bodhisattvas‚Äô completely good generation of mind.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po'i ye shes khong du chud pas mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag @215a *//
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po'i ye shes khong du chud pas mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag @215a *//
translated: Abiding in them, the bodhisattvas quickly attain skill in realizing the completely good wisdom.

analyzed: go ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious One!

analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These ten

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos te /
translated: are the bodhisattvas‚Äô completely good practices.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: They are as follows: The aspiration to remain for all future kalpas is a completely good practice.

original: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The vow to worship and serve all the Tathagatas of the future is the Dharma of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la dgod pa ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la dgod pa ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The vow to establish all sentient beings in the conduct of the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra is the Dharma of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //üîΩpha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so // pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The vow to gather all roots of virtue is the Dharma of the conduct of Samantabhadra.üîΩThe vow to engage in all the perfections is the Dharma of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The vow to perfect the conduct of all Bodhisattvas is the Dharma of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang pa'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang pa'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The vow to adorn all world systems is the Dharma of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skye ba gzung ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skye ba gzung ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The aspiration to be born in all buddha-fields is a teaching of Samantabhadra‚Äôs conduct.

original: chos thams cad yongs su btsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su btsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The aspiration to be skilled in investigating and discerning all phenomena is a teaching of Samantabhadra‚Äôs conduct.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i @215b smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i @215b smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so //
translated: The aspiration to attain complete and perfect awakening in all buddha-fields is a teaching of Samantabhadra‚Äôs conduct.

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ste /

original: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta'o //
analyzed: de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta'o //
translated: Through them, the bodhisattvas constantly and uninterruptedly observe the realm of sentient beings.

analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mgon med pa rnams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sems can gyi khams theg pa med pa la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mgon med pa rnams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sems can gyi khams theg pa med pa la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /
translated: They are: the attainment of great compassion that observes the realm of sentient beings who are without a protector; the attainment of great compassion that observes the realm of sentient beings who are without a vehicle; the attainment of great compassion that observes the realm of sentient beings who are poor in roots of virtue;

original: yun ring po nas gnyid kyi brgyal ba'i sems kyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /üîΩ'dod chags kyi bcing bas glags pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / srid pa'i grangs chen mtshor @216a *//
analyzed: yun ring po nas gnyid kyi brgyal ba'i sems kyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / dge ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / 'dod chags kyi bcing bas glags pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / srid pa'i grangs chen mtshor @216a *//
translated: They had attained great compassion that observes the realm of beings who are without virtue.üîΩThey had attained great compassion that observes the realm of beings who are bound by desire.üîΩThey had attained great compassion that observes the realm of beings who are immersed in the great ocean of existence.

original: rab tu gzhol bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu gzhol bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /
translated: They had attained great compassion that observes the realm of beings who have been sick for a long time.

original: dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las shin tu 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos las shin tu 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o //
translated: the great compassion of observing the realm of beings who have no interest in virtuous qualities, and the great compassion of observing the realm of beings who are completely lost with regard to the qualities of the Buddha.

analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
