original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen gang gis byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkyen gang gis byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams te /
translated: conditions for the mind of awakening, the conditions by which the mind of awakening arises in the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul bar bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rnam par gdul bar bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: Thus, the condition for the maturation and purification of the realm of sentient beings is the thought of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for the removal of the mass of suffering of all sentient beings is the thought of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad kyis sdud pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad kyis sdud pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for the attraction of all sentient beings by means of the requisites of happiness is the thought of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad kyi @216b mi shes pa bsal ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi @216b mi shes pa bsal ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for the removal of the ignorance of all sentient beings is the thought of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te //
translated: The condition for the attainment of the knowledge of a Buddha by all sentient beings is the thought of enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for the worship and service of all the Buddhas is the thought of enlightenment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for pleasing all the tathƒÅgatas is the condition of the mind of awakening.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for revealing the bodies, marks, and excellent signs of all the buddhas is the condition of the mind of awakening.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to //
translated: The condition for engaging with and comprehending the wisdom of all the buddhas is the condition of the mind of awakening.üîΩThe condition for revealing all the powers and fearlessnesses of the buddhas is the condition of the mind of awakening.

original: sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang / mi bsnyengs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to; ;kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to /
translated: conditions for the bodhisattvas‚Äô mind of awakening.

original: rkyen de dag gis byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: rkyen de dag gis byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: Through these conditions, the mind of awakening arises authentically.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang /
translated: The bodhisattvas who have given rise to the mind set on unsurpassed and perfect awakening should also serve and respect spiritual teachers in order to manifest the wisdom of omniscience.

original: bsnyen bkur bya'o //üîΩde dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang / @217a *//
analyzed: bsnyen bkur bya'o // de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang / @217a *//
translated: The bodhisattvas who have given rise to the mind set on unsurpassed and perfect awakening should also serve, venerate, and respect the spiritual friends in order to manifest the wisdom of omniscience.

original: bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bkur sti dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshe /
translated: When they serve, venerate, and respect the spiritual friends,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste /
translated: they should give rise to ten types of mind.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are these ten?

original: 'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang / dga' bar bya ba'i sems dang / ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du nan tan du bya ba'i sems dang / yid mi 'byung ba'i sems dang / ji snyam yang mi byed pa'i sems dang / gcig tu nges pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang / dga' bar bya ba'i sems dang / ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du nan tan du bya ba'i sems dang / yid mi 'byung ba'i sems dang / ji snyam yang mi byed pa'i sems dang / gcig tu nges pa'i sems dang /
translated: They are the mind of service, the mind of joy, the mind of practice according to the instructions, the mind of non-discouragement, the mind of non-contention, the mind of certainty,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang / smon lam gcig pa'i sems dang / ston pa'i sems dang / spyod pa mtshungs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang / smon lam gcig pa'i sems dang / ston pa'i sems dang / spyod pa mtshungs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems te /
translated: the mind that is the same continuum as all roots of virtue, the mind of a single aspiration, the mind of a teacher, and the mind of perfecting the same conduct.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa rnams so //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa rnams so //
translated: mind generations toward spiritual friends.

original: de sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed pa'i tshe /
translated: When one generates these ten mind generations,

original: yongs su dag pa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yongs su dag pa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: one attains ten purities.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar chud mi za ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can ji lta bur 'dul ba bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir gzugs yongs su dag pa dang / sgra skad dang / tha snyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar chud mi za ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can ji lta bur 'dul ba bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir gzugs yongs su dag pa dang / sgra skad dang / tha snyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: They are the purity of superior intention because of non-wastage, the purity of form because of teaching in accordance with the way sentient beings are to be disciplined, the purity of the ma·πá·∏çala of speech because of engaging in inconceivable language and conventions, the purity of the body because of the display of the body of the TathƒÅgata, the purity of the mind because of the display of the mind of the TathƒÅgata, the purity of the field because of the display of the field of the TathƒÅgata, the purity of the family because of the display of the family of the TathƒÅgata, the purity of birth because of the display of the birth of the TathƒÅgata, the purity of conduct because of the display of the conduct of the TathƒÅgata, and the purity of the display of the great enlightenment because of the display of the great enlightenment of the TathƒÅgata.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad dang @217b bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongs su dag pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad dang @217b bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: In order to be skilled in teaching the inconceivable qualities of the Buddha, they have pure eloquence; in order to be free from all ignorance, they have pure wisdom; in order to attain the full power of all bodhisattvas, they have pure birth;

original: sngon bskal ba mnyam par spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad spangs pas rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang /
analyzed: sngon bskal ba mnyam par spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgrib pa'i las thams cad spangs pas rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: in order to ripen the roots of virtue of sentient beings who have practiced in the same kalpas in the past, they have a pure retinue; in order to turn away from all obscuring actions, they have pure karmic ripening;

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /üîΩyongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste / yongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: the purity of aspiration, in order to be of the same nature as all bodhisattvas; and the purity of conduct, in order to emerge by means of the vehicle of Samantabhadra.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten perfections

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na; 'di ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs kyi bsam pa mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na; 'di ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs kyi bsam pa mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: What are they? They are the perfection of generosity, in order to give away all possessions; the perfection of conduct, in order to purify the conduct of the buddhas; the perfection of patience, in order to apply the power of patience and to not be disturbed by thoughts; the perfection of diligence, in order to be diligent in the accumulation of the qualities of the buddhas;

original: mos pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya @218a *//
analyzed: mos pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya @218a *//
translated: The perfection of diligence is for the sake of not turning back from all aspirations.üîΩThe perfection of concentration is for the sake of one-pointed mindfulness.üîΩThe perfection of wisdom is for the sake of correctly and exactly realizing all phenomena.

original: ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the perfection of effort in order to never turn back from all aspirations, the perfection of meditation in order to make mindfulness one-pointed, the perfection of wisdom in order to perfectly realize all phenomena just as they are, the perfection of wisdom in order to enter the Buddha's power, the perfection of aspiration in order to fulfill the perfect aspiration of Samantabhadra,

original: rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: the perfection of miraculous powers in order to demonstrate miracles and manifestations, and the perfection of Dharma in order to engage with all phenomena.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: perfections of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: Abiding in them, the bodhisattvas attain the unsurpassed perfection of the great gnosis of the tathagatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the conquerors,

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: these are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste /
translated: realizations of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ris bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: They are the realization of the knowledge of the different aspects of all world systems, the realization of the knowledge of the inconceivable categories of all the realms of sentient beings,

original: chos thams cad la gcig pa dang / tha dad par yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad la gcig pa dang / tha dad par yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to understand the knowledge that all phenomena are the same. It is to understand the knowledge that teaches the entire infinite realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ma @218b lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'das pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ma @218b lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'das pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to understand the knowledge that pervades the entire realm of space. It is to understand the knowledge of the engagement of all world systems in the future. It is to understand the knowledge of the engagement of all world systems in the past.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: the knowledge of the present time of all world systems,üîΩthe knowledge of the single realization of all the different conduct and aspirations of all the tathƒÅgatas,

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa gcig gis byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa gcig gis byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba'o //
translated: and the knowledge of the single conduct of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten knowledges

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste /
translated: that the bodhisattvas should understand.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba 'thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba 'thob pa dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: Abiding in those, bodhisattvas attain mastery over all the appearances of phenomena, attain the fulfillment of aspirations in accordance with their intentions, and attain the complete and perfect enlightenment of all buddhas through their conviction that all the qualities of buddhahood are of a single characteristic.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa ste /
translated: are the bodhisattvas‚Äô realizations.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar chos @219a *//
analyzed: 'di ltar chos @219a *//
translated: They are as follows:üîΩrealizing all phenomena to be of a single mode,

original: thams cad la tshul gcig tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshul tha dad par rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: thams cad la tshul gcig tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la tshul tha dad par rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa dang / sems can gyi sems dang / bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa dang /
translated: realizing all phenomena to be of different modes, realizing all phenomena to be of a single characteristic, realizing the wisdom that is free of attachment to the minds and thoughts of all sentient beings,

original: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang /
translated: the sameness of the faculties of all sentient beings, the afflictions and habitual tendencies of all sentient beings, the thoughts and latent tendencies of all sentient beings,

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs thams cad rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs thams cad rtogs pa dang /
translated: all the virtuous and nonvirtuous conduct of all sentient beings, the conduct, aspirations, displays, emanations, and blessings of all bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i byin gyi rlabs rtogs pa'o //

translated: and the blessings of the complete, perfect awakening to the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors,üîΩthese are the ten realizations

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa ste /

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /

analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs @219b dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang / chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
translated: They are the power of engaging with the nature of all phenomena, the power of all phenomena being like magical illusions, the power of all phenomena being like dreams, the power of all phenomena being like mirages, the power of all phenomena being like reflections, the power of all phenomena being like echoes, the power of all phenomena being like emanations, the power of all phenomena being like space, the power of all phenomena being like the sky, and the power of all phenomena being like the Dharma.

original: chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang /
translated: the power of the force of nonattachment to all phenomena, the power of the force of devotion to all the qualities of the Buddha, the power of the force of never abandoning the intention of great respect for all spiritual masters,

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la zab par yid ches pas mi spangs pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems las mi ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi shugs so //
translated: the power of the force of delighting the great king of wisdom through all roots of virtue, the power of the force of never abandoning the profound trust in all the qualities of the Buddha, and the power of the force of the skill of never turning away from the mind of omniscience.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

translated: They are the equality of all sentient beings, the equality of all phenomena, the equality of all buddha realms, the equality of all superior intentions, the equality of all roots of virtue, the equality of all bodhisattvas, the equality of all aspirations, the equality of all perfections, the equality of all bodhisattva levels, and the equality of all buddhas.

analyzed: chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dbang dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / bdud thams cad shin tu pham par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang /
translated: mastery in attaining the illumination of all phenomena, mastery in the practice of all roots of virtue, mastery of great wisdom, mastery of discipline that is not based on anything, mastery in dedicating all roots of virtue to enlightenment, mastery of the wisdom that never turns back from any of the activities of a bodhisattva, mastery of the wisdom that completely defeats all maras, mastery of the wisdom that gives rise to the mind of enlightenment wherever one goes, and mastery of the wisdom that is never separated from the mind of enlightenment.

original: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / smon lam thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas @222b pa'o //

translated: not to dwell on any place of birth, not to dwell on any aspiration, not to dwell on any conduct, not to dwell on any bodhisattva, and not to dwell on any buddha.

translated: Thus, it is the sameness of mind in accumulating all merit, the sameness of mind in all that arises from different kinds of aspirations, the sameness of mind in all the realms of sentient beings, the sameness of mind in all the ripening of the karma of sentient beings,üîΩthe sameness of mind in all the engagement with phenomena, the sameness of mind in all the afflictions and purities of realms, the sameness of mind in all the engagement with the aspirations of sentient beings,

translated: It is the accomplishment of the wisdom that engages in comprehending the entire net of directions. It is the accomplishment of the wisdom that engages in comprehending the world systems that are upside down and those that are not.

original: chos thams cad gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'byams klas par rnam par dgod pa la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug par zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /

translated: the wisdom that is accomplished in order to understand the skill in positing all phenomena as both the same and distinct, the wisdom that is accomplished in order to understand the engagement in comprehending all the continuums of the body,

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dus gsum du 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'o //

translated: the wisdom that is accomplished in order to understand the miracles and blessings of the tathƒÅgatas in all the realms of phenomena, and the wisdom that is accomplished in order to understand the uninterrupted lineage of the buddhas of the three times of all beings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /

analyzed: mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bla na med pa bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: I will make offerings and venerate them with unsurpassed veneration.‚Äù He thus obtains great relief.

original: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod nas kyang gdams ngag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sar byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gdams ngag dang /üîΩman ngag bstan pa mdzad kyi /
analyzed: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod nas kyang gdams ngag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sar byung bar gyur pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gdams ngag dang / man ngag bstan pa mdzad kyi /
translated: Having made offerings to those thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas, I will receive the instructions and follow-up teachings by which bodhisattvas have entered, are entering, and will enter the levels of bodhisattvas.

original: gdams ngag dang man ngag de yang bdag gis bsam pa thag pas rim gror byas te /
analyzed: gdams ngag dang man ngag de yang bdag gis bsam pa thag pas rim gror byas te /
translated: I will receive those instructions and follow-up teachings with a sincere mind,

original: mnyan la yang dag par nan tan du bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: mnyan la yang dag par nan tan du bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: bdag bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Jinaputra!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /üîΩsngon bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @225a *//üîΩpa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te / sngon bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @225a *// pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, the Bodhisattva thinks as follows:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: ‚ÄòFormerly, when I had not yet entered into the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment,

original: 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa'am /
analyzed: 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa'am /

original: grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa'am /
analyzed: grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa'am /

original: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am /

original: ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am /
analyzed: ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am /

analyzed: 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa yang rung ste /

analyzed: ji snyed kyi 'jigs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par bzlog par gyur /

analyzed: ring du byas par gyur /

original: rnam par bcil bar gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par bcil bar gyur te /

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu cis kyang mi 'jigs par gyur to //
translated: As soon as I gave rise to the thought of enlightenment, I became fearless in any situation.

original: mi dngang bar gyur to //
analyzed: mi dngang bar gyur to //
translated: I became free from anxiety.

original: skyi g-ya' ba med par gyur to //üîΩcis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyi g-ya' ba med par gyur to // cis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //

original: dngang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngang bar mi 'gyur ro //

original: skyi g-ya' bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyi g-ya' bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He becomes free from horripilation.üîΩTherefore, he becomes invincible to all demons, extremists, and adversaries, being steadfast, powerful, and unassailable.

original: de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil gyis mi non pas bdud dang / mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub par gyur to zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //üîΩkye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil gyis mi non pas bdud dang / mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub par gyur to zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo // kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems bskyed de /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, O son of the victors, the bodhisattva arouses his mind with the following thoughts:

original: bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: ‚ÄòWhen I practice bodhisattva conduct,

analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o //

analyzed: rab tu dgod par bya'o //

original: de dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang /
analyzed: de dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dad pa chen po dang @225b ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: With the generation of the thought endowed with great faith in those TathƒÅgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Awakened Buddhas,

analyzed: tshe'i tshad kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i rim gros mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya'o //
translated: they will make offerings and pay homage to the Buddhas with the proper veneration of a Buddha until the end of their lives.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /
translated: And after the ParinirvƒÅ·πáa of those TathƒÅgatas,

analyzed: sku gzugs la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mchod rten tshad med pa mang po bya'o //
translated: they will make countless st≈´pas for the purpose of making offerings to the physical relics.

original: de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: They will also protect their teachings.üîΩThey will also uphold the true Dharma of those TathƒÅgatas with the unsurpassed upholding of the true Dharma.

original: de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bzung ba bla na med pas yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su bzung ba bla na med pas yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: Thus they will obtain great relief.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: Moreover, a bodhisattva should generate the following thought:

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i mdzes pas brgyan par bya /üîΩspud par bya /üîΩklubs par bya /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i mdzes pas brgyan par bya / spud par bya / klubs par bya /
translated: I will adorn all world systems with unsurpassed beauty.üîΩI will adorn them,üîΩI will ornament them,

original: yongs su sbyang bar bya /
analyzed: yongs su sbyang bar bya /
translated: I will purify them,

original: mnyam par bya /üîΩbsgyur bar bya /
analyzed: mnyam par bya / bsgyur bar bya /
translated: I will make them even,üîΩI will transform them,

original: byin gyis brlab par bya /üîΩbskyod par bya /
analyzed: byin gyis brlab par bya / bskyod par bya /
translated: I will bless them,üîΩI will shake them,

original: snang bar bya /
analyzed: snang bar bya /
translated: I will illuminate them,

original: rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul bas dgang bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul bas dgang bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: and I will fill them with miracles and manifestations.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: Furthermore, a bodhisattva should arouse the following thought:

original: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad par bya'o //
translated: I will cut through the doubts of all sentient beings.

original: nem nur gcad par bya'o //üîΩbsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: nem nur gcad par bya'o // bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //

original: sems khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: sems khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: I will make their minds receptive.

original: nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog par bya'o //
translated: I will turn them away from afflictions.

original: ngan song gi sgo gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: ngan song gi sgo gcad par bya'o //
translated: I will close the doors to the lower realms.

original: bde pa'i las kyi sgo dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: bde pa'i las kyi sgo dbye bar bya'o //
translated: I will open the doors to virtuous activity.

original: mun pa rnam par bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: mun pa rnam par bsal bar bya'o //
translated: I will dispel darkness.

original: 'od kyis snang bar @226a *//
analyzed: 'od kyis snang bar @226a *//
translated: I will illuminate with light.

original: bya'o // bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi las rnams rab tu gdul bar bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o // bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi las rnams rab tu gdul bar bya'o //
translated: I will subdue all demons and the works of demons.

original: bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob pa 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob pa 'gro ba thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
translated: I will reveal to all beings the attainment of unsurpassed great bliss.üîΩI will generate it.

original: rab tu bskyed par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: rab tu bskyed par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: ‚Äù Thus he obtains great relief.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: Moreover, a bodhisattva generates the following thought:

original: bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni don yod pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni don yod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúMy seeing of the Buddha is not in vain.

original: ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa de tsam na mthong bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa de tsam na mthong bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Whenever I wish to see the TathƒÅgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, at that time I will see him.

original: bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: My seeing of the Buddha will not be interrupted.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'gyur ba ni rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The appearance of the TathƒÅgata will not be interrupted.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
translated: The TathƒÅgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One,üîΩ

original: au dum wa ra'i me tog lta bur bskal pa thams cad du skye zhing mthong bar dka' ba rnams las chos mnyan pa yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: au dum wa ra'i me tog lta bur bskal pa thams cad du skye zhing mthong bar dka' ba rnams las chos mnyan pa yang rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: I will be able to hear the Dharma from the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas, who are as rare as the udumbara flower and difficult to encounter throughout all eons.

original: de ltar bdag gi bsam pa yongs su dag pas /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gi bsam pa yongs su dag pas /
translated: In this way, my aspirations will be pure.

original: sems bskyed pa g-yo thams cad yongs su spangs pa drang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa sgyu'i rnam pa med pas /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa g-yo thams cad yongs su spangs pa drang ba'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa sgyu'i rnam pa med pas /
translated: With a mind that is free from all deceit and has an honest nature, and without any pretense,

original: sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas mthong ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: I will be able to bless each moment of mind with the vision of the buddhas.‚Äô

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

original: gzhan @226b yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: gzhan @226b yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: Moreover, a bodhisattva should give rise to the following attitude:

original: gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe /
translated: ‚ÄòWhen I attain unsurpassed and perfect awakening,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par dgang ngo //
translated: I will fill all the world systems with the emanations of the Buddha-fields.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
translated: Having attained supreme perfect enlightenment,

original: 'gro ba thams cad re rer sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad re rer sangs rgyas skye ba yongs su bstan par bya'o //
translated: I will manifest the birth of the Buddha in each and every world.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi rnga chen po brdung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi rnga chen po brdung bar bya'o //
translated: Having attained supreme perfect enlightenment, I will beat the great drum of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi sprin gyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam par spel pa'i smon lam chen pos /
analyzed: chos kyi sprin gyi char chen po mngon par dbab pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i nga ro chen pos rnam par spel pa'i smon lam chen pos /
translated: I will let fall the great rain of the cloud of the Dharma, I will give the great gift of the Dharma, and I will proclaim the great lion‚Äôs roar for the sake of purifying the great fearlessness.

original: chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i bskal par chos bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i bskal par chos bstan par bya'o //
translated: With the great vow to increase the teaching of the Dharma, I will teach the Dharma for an eon that abides in the realm of phenomena.

original: 'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi lus la dub pa med par 'gyur; ngag dang sems la dub pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gi lus la dub pa med par 'gyur; ngag dang sems la dub pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: However, through the blessing of great compassion, my body will not be exhausted, my speech will not be exhausted, and my mind will not be exhausted.

original: zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: Thus, they attain great relief.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious One!

original: bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste /üîΩde dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba bla na med @227a *//
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste / de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba bla na med @227a *//
translated: These ten are the great reliefs that bodhisattvas attain.

original: par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
analyzed: par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: Abiding in them, bodhisattvas attain the unsurpassed, manifest, complete enlightenment of the great wisdom of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious One!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa rnams te /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa rnams te /
translated: These ten are the bodhisattvas‚Äô profound engagements with the qualities of the Buddha.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa dang po'o //
translated: To enter into the past of all world-realms is the first entry into the profound Dharma of the Buddha.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa de dang de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa de dang de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: To enter into the future of all world-realms, however many there are, is the second entry into the profound Dharma of the Buddha.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su shes pa gang ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni /üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'grangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su shes pa gang ji snyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'jug pa 'di ni / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa gsum pa'o //
translated: To enter into the present of all world-realms, however many there are, whether they are world-realms that have come into being, world-realms that are in the process of becoming, world-realms that are taught as world-realms, world-realms that are pure, or world-realms that are known, is the third entry into the profound Dharma of the Buddha.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sna tshogs su 'jug pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sna tshogs su 'jug pa 'di ni /
translated: To enter into the variety of all world-realms is the fourth entry into the profound Dharma of the Buddha.üîΩTo enter into the variety of all world-realms is the fourth entry into the profound Dharma of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fourth entry into the profound Dharma of the Buddha.

original: sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni /
analyzed: sems can gyi las dang rnam par smin pa sna tshogs thams cad la 'jug pa 'di ni /

analyzed: de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med / yid gnyis med /

original: the tshom med de /
analyzed: the tshom med de /

original: de ni gnas ma yin no /

original: 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa gsum pa'o //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de /

analyzed: sems can gyi khams grangs med pa /

analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa /

translated: Even though one thinks, ‚ÄòI will ripen all of them through unsurpassed ripening and unsurpassed guidance,‚ÄôüîΩone has no doubt,üîΩno uncertainty,

analyzed: @230b the tshom med de /

original: de ni gnas ma yin no //

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious One!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam ste /

analyzed: yid gnyis med /

analyzed: de ni gnas ma yin no //
translated: That is impossible.

analyzed: 'di ni nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa'o //
translated: This is the sixth generation of the mind of enlightenment, which cuts off all hesitations.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: de ni gnas ma yin no //

analyzed: the tshom med pas /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid la gnas pa 'di ni /

analyzed: nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa brgyad pa'o //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: yid gnyis med la /

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /

analyzed: 'dus ma byas la shin tu gzhol ba /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam yang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam yang /

original: @231b de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med /üîΩyid gnyis med /
analyzed: @231b de la de ni de ltar mi 'gyur snyam pa'i nem nur med / yid gnyis med /

original: the tshom med de /
analyzed: the tshom med de /
translated: ‚Äú ‚ÄòI have no hesitation.‚Äô

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: ‚Äú ‚ÄòO son of the victors, these are the ten kinds of arousing of mind that cut through all hesitation.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid gnyis med la som nyi med pa rnams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur thams cad gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa the tshom med cing yid gnyis med la som nyi med pa rnams te /
translated: Bodhisattvas‚Äô minds that eliminate all doubts about all the buddhadharmas are free of doubt, free of uncertainty, and free of ambivalence.

original: de dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nem nur med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go /
translated: bodhisattvas attain the unsurpassed freedom from doubt about all the buddhadharmas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de /

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: If you ask what are the ten, they are as follows:

analyzed: 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin /

original: smon lam thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin /

analyzed: chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin /

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩgzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos thams cad la'ang rab tu 'jug pa smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi @232a *//
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i chos thams cad la'ang rab tu 'jug pa smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi @232a *//
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: khyab pa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa lnga pa'o //
translated: Moreover, O Son of the Victorious Ones, the bodhisattvas engage in all the profound dharmas and do not pass into parinirvƒÅ·πáa until all their aspirations are fulfilled. This is the fifth inconceivability.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, O Son of the Victorious Ones, when the bodhisattvas are practicing bodhisattva conduct,

original: mngal du 'gro ba dang / skye ba ba dang / gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dga' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang /
analyzed: mngal du 'gro ba dang / skye ba ba dang / gom pa bdun du 'gro ba dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dga' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang / snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba dang /
translated: They display entering the womb, being born, taking seven steps, living in the palace, leaving home, practicing austerities, going to the seat of awakening,

original: bdud 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs thams cad yongs su ston cing /
analyzed: bdud 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs thams cad yongs su ston cing /
translated: subduing demons, attaining full enlightenment, turning the wheel of Dharma, passing into parinirvƒÅ·πáa, and all the manifestations of the buddhas.

original: snying rje chen po dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i smon lam gyi bar gyis yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa drug pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i smon lam gyi bar gyis yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa drug pa'o //
translated: They are uninterrupted by great compassion and by the aspiration to protect all beings. This is the sixth inconceivability.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par sems bskyed pas /
translated: Furthermore, the bodhisattvas, with their mind of awakening that pervades the realm of phenomena,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par ston la /üîΩsems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyang yang dag par ston la / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba yang rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdun pa'o //
translated: They also reveal the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas and their blessings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma yod par 'jug /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma yod par 'jug /
translated: ‚ÄúMoreover, the bodhisattvas engage with all phenomena that are without characteristics as having characteristics.

original: mtshan ma yod pa la mtshan ma med par 'jug /üîΩrtog pa med pa la rtog pa yod par ston /
analyzed: mtshan ma yod pa la mtshan ma med par 'jug / rtog pa med pa la rtog pa yod par ston /
translated: They engage with those that have characteristics as being without characteristics.üîΩThey reveal what is without thought as having thought.

original: rtog @232b pa yod pa la rtog pa med par ston /
analyzed: rtog @232b pa yod pa la rtog pa med par ston /
translated: They reveal what has thought as being without thought.

original: dngos po med pa la dngos po yod par 'jug /
analyzed: dngos po med pa la dngos po yod par 'jug /

original: dngos po yod pa la dngos po med par 'jug /üîΩmngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med par ston /
analyzed: dngos po yod pa la dngos po med par 'jug / mngon par 'du byed pa la mngon par 'du bya ba med par ston /
translated: They engage with what is a thing as not being a thing.üîΩThey reveal what is not a composite as being a composite.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yod par ston /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la mngon par 'du bya ba yod par ston /
translated: They reveal what is a composite as not being a composite.

original: chos thams cad brjod du med pa la brjod du yod par shes /
analyzed: chos thams cad brjod du med pa la brjod du yod par shes /
translated: They know all phenomena, which are inexpressible, to be expressible.

original: chos thams cad brjod du yod pa la brjod du med par shes te /
analyzed: chos thams cad brjod du yod pa la brjod du med par shes te /
translated: He knows that all phenomena are inexpressible, even though they are expressible.

original: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa brgyad pa'o //
translated: This is the eighth inconceivability.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩgzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang sems dang mnyam par shes la /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang sems dang mnyam par shes la /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!üîΩFurthermore, the bodhisattva knows that awakening is equal to the mind,

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems dang byang chub tu shes mod kyi /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems dang byang chub tu shes mod kyi /

original: de'i sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med /

analyzed: 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med /

original: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgu pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dgu pa'o //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi skad cig re re zhing 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /

original: zag pa zad pa yin yang dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa zad par mi byed /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa yin yang dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa zad par mi byed /

analyzed: chos thams cad zag pa med par yang shes / zag pa zad par yang shes /

original: zag pa 'gag par yang shes shing /
analyzed: zag pa 'gag par yang shes shing /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'jig rten gyi chos su 'jug ste / 'jig rten gyi chos la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug kyang /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis 'jig rten gyi chos la rnam par @233a *//

analyzed: mi rtog / 'jig rten gyi chos kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog /

original: chos thams cad gzung ba med pa'i tshul du chos kyi dbyings su 'dzud la /
analyzed: chos thams cad gzung ba med pa'i tshul du chos kyi dbyings su 'dzud la /

analyzed: chos thams cad 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gnyis su med par yang shes pa 'di ni /

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu pa'o //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /üîΩbcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po de dag ni /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors,üîΩthese are the ten inconceivabilities

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te /

translated: the liberation of going to all world systems in a single instant of mind, the liberation of displaying the birth of all buddhas in a single world system, the liberation of knowing a single body to be in all world systems,

original: sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang / rnam par rol ba dang / mi 'bral ba yongs su bstan pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //

original: rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par lus yongs su bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /

translated: the superknowledge of knowing the skill in manifesting emanations in inexpressibly many bodies;üîΩthe superknowledge of knowing the skill in manifesting the attainment of unexcelled, perfect enlightenment in inexpressibly many world systems.üîΩ‚Äú

analyzed: bsam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste /

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras / bcu po 'di dag ni /

original: bcu gang zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dmigs pas dben zhing byed pa med pa la spros pa med pa'i sems rab tu zhi ba mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dmigs pas dben zhing byed pa med pa la spros pa med pa'i sems rab tu zhi ba mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang /
translated: What are they?üîΩThey are the knowledge and expertise in the creation of the ripening of the karma of all beings; the knowledge and expertise in the creation of the mind of peace, which is free of conceptual elaboration and action, and is devoid of the reference points of all worlds;

original: dmigs pa thams cad la zhugs pas sems gcig la yang tha dad du dmigs shing /
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad la zhugs pas sems gcig la yang tha dad du dmigs shing /

original: chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi rig pa dang / dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs pas /
analyzed: chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyi rig pa dang / dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs pas /
translated: the knowledge of the vajra-like wisdom that fully realizes all phenomena;üîΩthe knowledge of the skill and understanding of the accomplishment of the blessing of inconceivable melodies that are understood in infinite world systems;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mu med par go bar bya bar mngon par grub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig la @237b dang / gnas thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / skye ba la mkhas pa dang /

translated: the knowledge of the skill and understanding of the accomplishment of the complete destruction of all abodes;üîΩthe knowledge of the skill of birth and the accomplishment of the skill of nonbirth;

original: mi skye ba la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i yul thams cad rnam par bzlog pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: mi skye ba la mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa shes pa'i rig pa dang / 'du shes dang / tshor ba'i yul thams cad rnam par bzlog pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas shing shes pa'i rig pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: the knowledge of the skill and understanding of the accomplishment of the reversal of all the objects of perception and sensation;üîΩ‚ÄúO son of the victors!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba med cing rnam par dgod pa gcig tu gyur pa dang / rnam par dgod pa med pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba sna tshogs tha dad pa rab tu shes te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba med cing rnam par dgod pa gcig tu gyur pa dang / rnam par dgod pa med pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba sna tshogs tha dad pa rab tu shes te /
translated: Furthermore, the bodhisattva knows the various objects of knowledge, which are not without characteristics and are not without the absence of characteristics, by means of the single arrangement and the absence of arrangement of all phenomena.

original: tshad med pa'i bskal par chos ston cing /
analyzed: tshad med pa'i bskal par chos ston cing /

original: chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'byung ba 'di ni ye shes kyi rig pa brgyad pa'o //

translated: and he manifests unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by means of the mode of being in the Dharma-constituent. This is the eighth knowledge.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: chos la mngon par chags pa mi skyed /

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i sems kyis yongs su skyod par byed /

analyzed: chos bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang rab tu shes par byed /

analyzed: sems can gyi grangs kyang rab tu shes par byed / sems can rnam pa @239a *//

analyzed: tha dad pa yang rab tu shes par byed / sdug bsngal skye ba yang rab tu shes par byed /

original: mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
analyzed: mig yor lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /

original: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad rtsa ba nas rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: skye ba'i skye mched thams cad rtsa ba nas rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems bskyed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing /
translated: They practice the bodhisattva conduct without engaging in conduct in order to protect all beings, with a motivation that is never interrupted in all the places of birth.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su bslab pa dang / rtog pa'i phyin ci log thams cad khong du chud pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su bslab pa dang / rtog pa'i phyin ci log thams cad khong du chud pa /

original: ri bo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo la gzhol bas /
analyzed: ri bo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo la gzhol bas /
translated: They are like the most excellent and great king of mountains, and they are intent on the gateway to omniscience.

original: sems can thams cad srid pa'i gangs chen mtsho las phyir bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes 'byams klas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad srid pa'i gangs chen mtsho las phyir bzlog pa'i phyir ye shes 'byams klas pa /
translated: They have infinite wisdom in order to turn all beings away from the great ocean of the suffering of existence.

original: che zhing mi g-yo ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
analyzed: che zhing mi g-yo ba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, which is great and immovable.‚Äô

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni shes pa'i rig pa bcu pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni shes pa'i rig pa bcu pa'o //
translated: This is the tenth knowledge.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /

analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rig pa ste /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ste /

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba dang / lta ba las rnam par grol ba dang / nye bar len pa las rnam par grol ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched las rnam par grol ba dang / nyan thos dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba dang / lta ba las rnam par grol ba dang / nye bar len pa las rnam par grol ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched las rnam par grol ba dang / nyan thos dang /
translated: It is liberation from the afflictions, liberation from views, liberation from appropriation, liberation from the aggregates, elements, and sense sources,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las 'da' ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / 'gro ba'i zhing thams cad nas sems can gyi chos las gyen du bskyod pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las 'da' ba'i rnam par grol ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / 'gro ba'i zhing thams cad nas sems can gyi chos las gyen du bskyod pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /
translated: liberation from the vehicles of the hearers and solitary buddhas, liberation from attaining acceptance of the fact that phenomena are not produced, liberation from the world and from the phenomena of sentient beings,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgrub pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gyen du bskyod de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgrub pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gyen du bskyod de /
translated: liberation from the bodhisattvas‚Äô infinite accomplishments, and liberation from all bodhisattva conduct.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'thob pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / dus gsum thams cad skad cig gcig gis shes pa'i rnam par grol ba'o //
translated: the liberation of attaining the level of the tathagatas, and the liberation of knowing all three times in a single instant.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors,

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ste /
translated: liberations of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bla na med pa sems can rnams kyis 'thob par byed pa dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bla na med pa sems can rnams kyis 'thob par byed pa dag go /
translated: Abiding in them, the bodhisattvas accomplish the unsurpassed activity of the buddhas for the sake of sentient beings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors,

analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
