analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis skyed mos tshal te /
translated: pleasure groves of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar yongs su skyo ba med pas 'khor ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mi dga' ba @240a *//
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na / 'di ltar yongs su skyo ba med pas 'khor ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mi dga' ba @240a *//
translated: What are they?

original: med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / spyod pa chen po bskyed cing /
analyzed: med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / spyod pa chen po bskyed cing /
translated: They are the pleasure grove of samsara, which is not a source of weariness; the pleasure grove of bringing sentient beings to full maturity, which is not a source of displeasure; the pleasure grove of the great conduct, which is a source of delight;

original: rab tu 'dzin pas bskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / rang gi khyim ltar dga' bas 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdud kyi yul mngon par 'dul bas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyi skyed mos tshal dang /
analyzed: rab tu 'dzin pas bskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / rang gi khyim ltar dga' bas 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdud kyi yul mngon par 'dul bas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyi skyed mos tshal dang /
translated: the garden of delight in all kalpas through perfect retention, the garden of the pure world through delight like one‚Äôs own home, the garden of all the demon‚Äôs abodes through subduing the domain of demons,

original: tshul bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas ji skad du thos pa'i chos rtogs par gzhog pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdag gi pha'i yul la spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skyed mos tshal dang /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du rab tu rtogs pas ji skad du thos pa'i chos rtogs par gzhog pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / bdag gi pha'i yul la spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skyed mos tshal dang /
translated: the garden of realizing the Dharma as it is heard through perfect realization, the garden of the six perfections, the four means of gathering, and the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment through engaging in the domain of one‚Äôs father,

original: chos gzhan yid la mi byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par gdul ba dang /
analyzed: chos gzhan yid la mi byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par gdul ba dang /
translated: Without attending to any other phenomena, they enter the garden of all the qualities of buddhahood, the display of the great transcendence of suffering, the ten powers of the thus-gone ones, the four fearlessnesses, the eighteen distinctive qualities of the buddhas, and, in short, all the qualities of buddhahood.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mi gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs shing /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mi gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba dang / byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs shing /
translated: Without abandoning the turning of the wheel of Dharma, they enter the garden of the displays, the playful manifestations, and the blessings of all bodhisattvas, and they pervade all worlds with their Dharma body.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings @240b dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas sems kyi skad cig thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang mi 'bral ba 'gro ba thams cad du bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal lo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings @240b dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas sems kyi skad cig thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang mi 'bral ba 'gro ba thams cad du bstan pa'i skyed mos tshal lo //
translated: Since they realize the sameness of the realm of space, they are never separated from the attainment of complete buddhahood in every instant of mind. These are the pleasure groves that are shown to all beings.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal te /
translated: pleasure groves of the bodhisattvas.

original: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su skyo ba med pa'i spyod pa chen po bla na med pas dga' ba rab tu 'thob pa dag go /
analyzed: de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su skyo ba med pa'i spyod pa chen po bla na med pas dga' ba rab tu 'thob pa dag go /
translated: Abiding in them, the bodhisattvas attain great delight through their unsurpassable conduct that is free from weariness.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang ste /
translated: palaces of the bodhisattvas.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?üîΩThey are the palace of the mind of awakening, which is free from decline;

original: 'di ltar nyams pa med pas byang chub kyi sems kyi gzhal med khang dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar nyams pa med pas byang chub kyi sems kyi gzhal med khang dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pas /
translated: the palace of the realm of sentient beings in the desire realm, which is brought to full maturity;

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi gzhal med khang dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pas /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi gzhal med khang dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pas /
translated: the celestial palaces of the paths of the ten virtues, of the accumulations of merit and wisdom, and of the realm of beings in the form realm;

original: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la bsam gtan 'cha' ba'i gzhal med khang dang / nyon mongs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis mi gos pas /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la bsam gtan 'cha' ba'i gzhal med khang dang / nyon mongs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis mi gos pas /
translated: the celestial palaces of the four abodes of Brahma, which are the bases of concentration; the celestial palaces of birth in the abodes of the gods of the pure abodes, because they are unstained by any substance of the afflictions;

original: gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i gzhal med khang dang / sems can mi khom pa thob par las rnam pa bzlog pas /
analyzed: gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i gzhal med khang dang / sems can mi khom pa thob par las rnam pa bzlog pas /
translated: the celestial palaces of the realms of the formless gods, because they turn beings away from the actions that lead to the unfortunate states;üîΩthe celestial palaces of the realms of the gods of the desire realm, because they cause beings to rise above all the afflictions;

original: gzugs med pa'i lha'i rgyud kyi gzhal med khang dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las sems can gyen du bskyod pas /üîΩkun nas nyon mongs pa'i @241a *//

translated: the ornament of aspiration because they never turn back from the aspirations that are to be accomplished by all bodhisattvas, the ornament of conduct because they arise through the vehicle of Samantabhadra, the ornament of realm because they bless all realms to be a single realm,

translated: With the adornment of the ma·πá·∏çala of melody, they cause the great rain of the cloud of Dharma to fall everywhere; with the adornment of blessings, they do not interrupt their conduct throughout all the countless eons; with the adornment of the ma·πá·∏çala of light rays, they illuminate the entire realm of phenomena with a single light ray; with the adornment of the ma·πá·∏çala of wisdom, they know the various inclinations of all sentient beings and the various faculties of all sentient beings; with the adornment of the ma·πá·∏çala of the Dharma, they teach the Dharma in all languages; with the adornment of the ma·πá·∏çala of the body, they display the body of a single sentient being as the bodies of all sentient beings.

original: sems @242b kyis khong du chud par byed pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa'i mthu las phyir mi ldog pas 'phrul ba'i rgyan to //

translated: the way of viewing wisdom in all the roots of virtue of the three times; the way of viewing wisdom in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô conduct and manifestations; the way of viewing wisdom in the gateway of the way of all phenomena;

translated: the blessings of all the buddhas, the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways, teaching the Dharma in all world systems,

translated: entering all the realms of phenomena, the inconceivable in all the ten directions, and the unobstructed light of wisdom of all the qualities of the buddhas.

analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar bstan pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa dang / chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa bstan pa dang / chos thams @244b cad mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa dang /
translated: They are the teaching that all phenomena arise in dependence, the teaching that all phenomena are like illusions, the teaching that all phenomena are free from afflictions, the teaching that all phenomena are beyond center and edge,

original: chos thams cad gnas med par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad rdo rje lta bur bstan pa dang / chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa dang / chos thams cad 'byung ba'i lam du bstan pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad gnas med par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad rdo rje lta bur bstan pa dang / chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs par bstan pa dang / chos thams cad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa dang / chos thams cad 'byung ba'i lam du bstan pa dang /
translated: the teaching that all phenomena are without location, the teaching that all phenomena are like a vajra, the teaching that all phenomena are the thus-gone ones, the teaching that all phenomena are completely pacified, the teaching that all phenomena are the path of arising,

analyzed: chos thams cad don gcig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su ma grub par bstan pa'o //

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

original: bcu po de dag ni /

analyzed: 'di ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang / the tshom dang yid gnyis rnam par 'thor ba yongs su dag pa dang / lta ba yongs su dag pa dang / spyod yul yongs su dag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: In this way, they are completely purified of superior intention, completely purified of scattering doubts and uncertainty, completely purified of view, completely purified of sphere of activity, completely purified of interest in omniscience,

original: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam par spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par dam bcas pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang /
analyzed: tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam par spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par dam bcas pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: completely purified of knowledge of distinctions, completely purified of fearlessness, completely purified of the knowledge that rejects all bodhisattvas, completely purified of accomplishing all the bodhisattva vows,

original: bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing /
translated: and completely purified of the thirty-two marks of a great being that are the signs of a hundred merits.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i chos @245a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i dge ba'i chos @245a *//
translated: They are completely purified of the ultimate virtuous qualities of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

analyzed: dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: all roots of virtue are completely purified.

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

original: bcu po de dag ni /
analyzed: bcu po de dag ni /
translated: These are the ten

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su dag pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su dag pa ste /

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious Ones!

analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal shes kyang /

analyzed: skrag par mi byed de /

original: smon lam las phyir mi ldog cing /
analyzed: smon lam las phyir mi ldog cing /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal ba la mthar thug pa med pa 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO jinaputras!

original: gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rang gi kun nas nyon mongs pas shin tu 'khrugs par gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan par brjod cing /üîΩngan du zer la /
analyzed: gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rang gi kun nas nyon mongs pas shin tu 'khrugs par gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan par brjod cing / ngan du zer la /
translated: Moreover, when ordinary foolish beings, who are disturbed by their own afflictions, speak unpleasantly to the bodhisattvas,üîΩuse abusive language,

analyzed: mi tshul ba dang / rtsub pa'i ngag @245b 'byin cing /

original: de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal pa las skyo bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su btsal pa las skyo bar mi 'gyur la /

analyzed: bzod pa dang / mos pa mang bar spyod cing /

analyzed: chos skyon med pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa 'di ni /

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second seal that leads to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious One!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, when the bodhisattvas are taught the profound Dharma of the buddhas,

analyzed: khong nas shes pas 'jug cing mos pa dang / yid ches pa dang / dga' ba dang / mngon par dad par 'gyur ba 'di ni /
translated: they engage with it through their inner knowledge, and they have conviction, trust, joy, and faith.

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya gsum pa'o //
translated: This is the third seal that leads to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO Son of the Victorious One!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi shes pas bdag shes par byed cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi shes pas bdag shes par byed cing /
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattvas know themselves through their own knowledge,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa /
translated: and they give rise to the mind set on omniscience.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas 'byung bas sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas 'byung bas sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: I will become a buddha.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //üîΩdga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba chen pos byung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / mos pa chen po'i rgyus rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus chen pos 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud du 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i sems can @246a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o // dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba chen pos byung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / mos pa chen po'i rgyus rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus chen pos 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud du 'khor zhing nyon mongs pa'i sems can @246a *//
translated: I will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rnams rab tu dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rnams rab tu dgrol bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni /
translated: With a mind that has arisen from great joy, interest, and delight, and with great diligence that has increased through the cause of great interest, I will go to the five destinies, and I will completely liberate from their afflictions those sentient beings who are afflicted.‚Äù

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fourth seal that leads to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of the victors!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mu med pa la 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las mtshams kyis dpog pa mi byed cing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mu med pa la 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las mtshams kyis dpog pa mi byed cing /
translated: Moreover, a bodhisattva enters into the boundless wisdom of the tathƒÅgatas, but he does not measure the wisdom of the tathƒÅgatas by setting limits.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun tu mtha' yas pa thos shing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kun tu mtha' yas pa thos shing /
translated: From the limitless blessed buddhas, they hear the limitless wisdom of the thus-gone ones.

original: tshad 'dzin par mi byed cing /
analyzed: tshad 'dzin par mi byed cing /
translated: They do not measure it.

original: yi ge rnam par dgod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las mtshams su dpog par mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: yi ge rnam par dgod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las mtshams su dpog par mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: They do not limit the thus-gone ones‚Äô wisdom with any written words.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya lnga pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya lnga pa'o //
translated: This is the fifth seal that leads to unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: ‚ÄúO son of noble family!

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shin tu mos pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu shin tu mos pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, bodhisattvas have a deep interest in unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: mos pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / mos pa zab pa dang / mos pa yangs pa dang / mos pa che ba dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa zil gyis mi non pa dang / mos pa bla na med pa dang /
analyzed: mos pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / mos pa zab pa dang / mos pa yangs pa dang / mos pa che ba dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa zil gyis mi non pa dang / mos pa bla na med pa dang /

translated: Here, the bodhisattva should think, ‚ÄúI will defeat all the mƒÅras and the gods of the mƒÅra class.‚ÄùüîΩHe should generate the thought of non-retrogression.

original: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcad do snyam ste /

original: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / legs par bshad pas sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / legs par bshad pas sems can gyi khams thams cad tshim par bya'o snyam ste /
translated: He should think, ‚ÄúI will satisfy the entire realm of sentient beings with good explanations.‚Äù

analyzed: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su rdzogs par bya bas /

original: yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o snyam ste /
translated: I will gather them all together.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúI will accomplish the great undertaking of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, the great treasure.‚Äù

original: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / gter chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtsams pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rdzogs par dka' ba yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam ste; zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /

translated: ‚ÄúI will accomplish the difficult perfection of bodhisattva conduct.‚Äù

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i gdul bas yongs su smin par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa'i yongs su smin par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i gdul bas yongs su smin par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI will ripen all the realms of sentient beings with unsurpassed ripening and unsurpassed taming.‚Äù

original: @250a *// gdul bar bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: @250a *// gdul bar bya'o snyam ste /

original: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / brgya stong du ma las 'das pa'i kha dog tu mos pas bsgyur la /
analyzed: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha dog du ma dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / brgya stong du ma las 'das pa'i kha dog tu mos pas bsgyur la /
translated: ‚ÄúI will transform all world systems into many colors, into various colors, into colors beyond many hundreds of thousands of colors.‚Äù

analyzed: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam ste /
translated: ‚ÄúI will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.‚Äù

original: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
analyzed: zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones!üîΩFurthermore, a bodhisattva should generate the following attitude:

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta sems bskyed pa dang / bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /

original: lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / glang po dang / rta dang / rgyal srid dang /
analyzed: lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma dang / glang po dang / rta dang / rgyal srid dang /

analyzed: g-yog 'khor thams cad slong ba zhig byung na de la bdag gis thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya ste /

original: rnam par smin pa la re ba med cing /

original: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa chen po'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems bskyed pas /

analyzed: lus thams cad kyang yongs su gtang ngo snyam ste / zhum pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kye rgyal ba'i sras /

original: gzhan @250b yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te /üîΩdus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang / dus thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang / spyod par brtags pa'i khams thams cad dang /
analyzed: gzhan @250b yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / zhing thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang / dus thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang / spyod par brtags pa'i khams thams cad dang /
translated: O Son of the Conqueror!üîΩMoreover, the bodhisattva should think, I will, with the wisdom that is possessed by a single instant of thought, understand all the buddhas of the three times, all the qualities of the Buddha, all sentient beings, all realms, all beings, all times, all realms of space, all realms of the investigation of conduct,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams zhi ba gang ji snyed pa thams cad dang / chos tha dad pa de dag thams cad sems skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bya /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams zhi ba gang ji snyed pa thams cad dang / chos tha dad pa de dag thams cad sems skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis shes par bya /

original: rtogs par bya /
analyzed: rtogs par bya /

analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya; blta bar bya / khong du chud par bya /

analyzed: bsgom par bya / rnam par bsgom par bya /
translated: understood,üîΩcultivated,üîΩcontemplated,

original: mngon par shes par bya /

analyzed: yongs su shes par bya /

analyzed: rab tu spang bar bya /

analyzed: mngon du bya ste /

original: de dag thams cad la ma brtags /
analyzed: de dag thams cad la ma brtags /

analyzed: rnam par ma brtags / sna tshogs su ma byas /

analyzed: rnam pa tha dad du ma byas / ched du bskyod par ma byas /
